ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_isgim | |- ( F e. ( R GrpIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : ( Base ` R ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_ghmf1o | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> ( F : ( Base ` R ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) <-> `' F e. ( S GrpHom R ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : ( Base ` R ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ `' F e. ( S GrpHom R ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_bitri | |- ( F e. ( R GrpIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ `' F e. ( S GrpHom R ) ) ) |
